title: LF Top laner
body: We need a top laner to round up our dynamic group. Post down below if you're interested and I'll get back to the suitable candidates. Keep in mind that i'll be reviewing profiles and stats. It would be handy if the player was Diamond+ already in order to queue with Challengers, however we do have smurf accounts available.

replies.body:
add me im b4 but play like a wood 5 adc main
{{champion:38}}
I was gonna say something but I looked you up and noticed your master tier XD I guess I don't have a chance then....
Haha, sorry.  I didn't suggest a minimum rank because its so early into the season.
